summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to a grant from the Department of Energy through the Puget Sound Clean Air Agency and allocated through the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 for the purpose of installing electric vehicle charging infrastructure; accepting the grant funds, authorizing the Mayor or his designee to execute related agreements, increasing appropriations in the 2010 Adopted Budget and ratifying and confirming certain prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
